metadata.title: CVE-2016-2233 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Stack-based buffer overflow in the inbound_cap_ls function in common/inbound.c in HexChat 2.10.2 allows remote IRC servers to cause a denial of service (crash) via a large number of options in a CAP LS message.

criterions.comment: hexchat package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.12.4-1').
